tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) due to insufficient sanitization of fields, comments, and metadata. An attacker can exploit this to inject malicious scripts, potentially leading to data theft, session hijacking, or other security risks.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `camaleon_cms` library to the patch version.
